import api from'./api';// Get swappable slots
export const getSwappableSlots=async()=>{const response=await api.get('/swappable-slots');return response.data;};// Create swap request
export const createSwapRequest=async(mySlotId,theirSlotId)=>{const response=await api.post('/swap-request',{mySlotId,theirSlotId});return response.data;};// Respond to swap request
export const respondToSwapRequest=async(requestId,accept)=>{const response=await api.post("/swap-response/".concat(requestId),{accept});return response.data;};
